column5: so i'm tired of fussing with the old bandsaw and its starting to look out of place in the woodshop/tool addiction center.  so i pulled the trigger on this bad boy and it comes tomorrow.  its a 17" general 240 M, and if anyone wants to help get it out of the truck and into the shop..............    total overkill, but i don't beleive there is such a thing as too big of a tool - unless my dentist is holding it!
nummy nummy !!!!!!! Thats a 5 star Brigadier General
Nice piece of machinery for a serious woodworker.

I have used General Bandsaw's for years, and they are very nice. I hope you get alot of enjoyment from it. one word of caution.. do not try and move the saw by the table.. I learned that lesson from experience  G.
You just need a nice meat table to go with it now. Man that could chop up some venison fast.   Nice purchase.
total overkill, but i don't beleive there is such a thing as too big of a tool - unless my dentist is holding it!  you obviously have never gone for a colonoscopy have you?
You DO know you dont HAVE to have one of those every month, right Skeets
